title: Computer Vision App
description: A tool for real-time object detection using YOLOv8. Built with Python and React, this project demonstrates advanced computer vision techniques and real-time inference on video streams. Includes a dashboard for analytics and model performance.

title: Why I Love Data Science
description: Thoughts on the intersection of AI and creativity. Data science is not just about numbersâ€”it's about finding patterns, telling stories, and making an impact in the world through technology and insight.

title: Generative Art Gallery
description: A collection of generative art pieces created using Python, Processing, and JavaScript. Each piece explores randomness, geometry, and color in unique ways.

title: Uni Project
description: A university project focused on deep learning for medical image analysis. Explored segmentation, classification, and explainability in neural networks.

title: Getting Started with PyTorch
description: A beginner-friendly guide to building neural networks with PyTorch. Covers tensors, autograd, and building your first image classifier.

title: The Future of Computer Vision
description: Exploring trends and breakthroughs in computer vision, from self-driving cars to augmented reality and beyond.
